title: label-resample
description:
RESAMPLE A LABEL FILE TO A DIFFERENT MESH.

Resamples a label file, given two spherical surfaces that are in register.  If ADAP_BARY_AREA is used, exactly one of -area-surfs or -area-metrics must be specified.

The ADAP_BARY_AREA method is recommended for label data, because it should be better at resolving vertices that are near multiple labels, or in case of downsampling.  Midthickness surfaces are recommended for the vertex areas for most data.

The -largest option results in nearest vertex behavior when used with BARYCENTRIC, as it uses the value of the source vertex that has the largest weight.

When -largest is not specified, the vertex weights are summed according to which label they correspond to, and the label with the largest sum is used.

The <method> argument must be one of the following:

ADAP_BARY_AREA
BARYCENTRIC

current-area.description: a relevant anatomical surface with <current-sphere> mesh

new-area.description: a relevant anatomical surface with <new-sphere> mesh

anyOf.description: specify surfaces to do vertex area correction based on

area-surfs.description: specify surfaces to do vertex area correction based on

current-area.description: a metric file with vertex areas for <current-sphere> mesh

new-area.description: a metric file with vertex areas for <new-sphere> mesh

anyOf.description: specify vertex area metrics to do area correction based on

area-metrics.description: specify vertex area metrics to do area correction based on

roi-out.description: the output roi as a metric

anyOf.description: output the ROI of vertices that got data from valid source vertices

valid-roi-out.description: output the ROI of vertices that got data from valid source vertices

roi-metric.description:
use an input roi on the current mesh to exclude non-data vertices

the roi, as a metric file

bypass-sphere-check.description: ADVANCED: allow the current and new 'spheres' to have arbitrary shape as long as they follow the same contour

largest.description: use only the label of the vertex with the largest weight

current-sphere.description: a sphere surface with the mesh that the label file is currently on

new-sphere.description: a sphere surface that is in register with <current-sphere> and has the desired output mesh
